util
Class EmailDataset

java.lang.Object
  util.EmailDataset
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<EmailMessage>
public class EmailDataset
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<EmailMessage>

Class that represents a set of email messages usefull to be returned by the TFReader class encapsulates a list of Email Messages to ease the processing of muliple messages to generate usefull structures like HashMaps of the occurrency of all the tokens in a message set

Author:
davide, ainara
